013package org.apache.juneau.rest.client;
014
015import java.io.*;
016
017import org.apache.http.*;
018import org.apache.http.client.methods.*;
019import org.apache.http.protocol.*;
020
021/**
022 * Default HTTP call handler.
023 *
024 * Can be subclasses and specified via {@link RestClient.Builder#callHandler()}.
025 *
026 * <ul class='seealso'>
027 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="../../../../../overview-summary.html#juneau-rest-client">juneau-rest-client</a>
028 * </ul>
029 */
030public class BasicRestCallHandler implements RestCallHandler {
031
032   private final RestClient client;
033
034   /**
035    * Constructor.
036    *
037    * @param client The client to use for handling requests.
038    */
039   public BasicRestCallHandler(RestClient client) {
040      this.client = client;
041   }
042
043   @Override /* RestCallHandler */
044   public HttpResponse run(HttpHost target, HttpRequest request, HttpContext context) throws IOException {
045      return target == null ? client.execute((HttpUriRequest)request, context) : client.execute(target, request, context);
046   }
047}
